path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/HAECHI_AUDIT/[HAECHI AUDIT] MarbleX NFT Marketplace Audit Report.pdf

findings.title: The hashOrder related vulnerability is not patched, leads to potential theft of assets
findings.description: The hashOrder function does not consider the dynamic array lengths of its input arguments (bytes calldata, bytes replacementPattern, bytes staticExtradata), leading to potential asset theft.
